Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
1421 Kristina Way is located in the highly sought-after Greenbrier section of Chesapeake, VA. Greenbrier offers easy access to Interstate 64 and Interstate 464 (Chesapeake Expressway). Within
minutes of this property, you will find a large variety of restaurants, shopping, and banking, and in the surrounding area, you will find companies such as Dollar Tree, Fed Ex, General Dynamics, Sentara Healthcare, Bon Secours, and Strayer University.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 1,768 SF Office Condo FOR SALE - West End with Building Signage Opportunity

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 1910 Association Drive (â€œBuildingâ€) is a two story plus lower-level, freestanding office building situated on 1.68 acres within the Center for Education Association (â€œCEAâ€) campus in Reston, Virginia. The Building is located on the north side of Association Drive, which is a two lane access road that is connected to Sunrise Valley Drive. The 29,710 square foot property was designed by HOK Architects and constructed in 1981 as a part of the planned CEA educational community. The building has been continuously owned and occupied by FCCLA since the building was constructed and includes seventy (70) surface parking spaces. Currently there are four (4) tenants in the Building as well as a parking license for 15 spaces.
